title: Wings to Bermuda
creator_credit: Pan American World Airways and Harry L. Coleman
brief_description: A young couple spend their honeymoon in Bermuda. The camera follows them as they observe the beauty of the island’s flower gardens, visit caves, play golf, swim, surf or water ski. Exploring the hidden world bellows the sea is a highlight of the tour, as is a midnight barbecue under a full Bermuda moon.
